name: incident_summary
description: Summarize a review bomb incident including affected business, review patterns, and current status. Use this to get an overview of a specific incident.

incident_id.description: The incident ID to summarize (e.g., INC-abc123)

esql: FROM incidents | WHERE incident_id == "{{ incident_id }}" | LOOKUP JOIN businesses ON business_id | KEEP incident_id, business_name, detected_at, severity, status, review_count, avg_rating, avg_trust_score, resolution
